entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dome Creek
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
